text: E'ibhabe tomake amara pathiyechi ekati jatira madhye yara purbe bahu jati gata haye geche, yena tumi tadera kache patha karate para ya amara tomara kache pratyadesa karachi, tathapi tara abisbasa kare parama karunamayera prati! Bala -- ''tini'i amara prabhu, tini chara an'ya upasya ne'i, tamra'i upare ami nirbhara kari ara tamra kache'i amara pratyabartana.â€™â€™
